visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Rainfall Data'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and include configurations for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with the title 'Monthly Rainfall Data'. The chart is styled with a serif font, a light background color, and specific margins for better spacing. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a darker gray color and a slightly larger font size for readability. The y-axis title is also styled with a larger font size. The data series represents monthly rainfall data, with each column colored green and data labels enabled for clarity. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
